name: 丹尼尔·约翰逊
name_full: 丹尼尔·约翰逊 Daniel Johnson

last_movies.title: 追缉：死亡游戏 第二季

introduction: Daniel Johnson of Pittsburgh, PA, has done phenomenal work as an actor in the following series: Netflix - Mindhunter, Manhunt, Showtime - Escape at Dannemora, and Archive 81. His movie debut was in 2021 with the horror film, The Boonies. This year will be a memorable year with the breakout TV series Swipe, BLAM, God's Love Saved Me, A Lost Mind, Son Of A Preacher Man, Shadows of The Night, and The New-Fangled Adventures of Alexia & Z "The Case of Grams Missing Teeth." Daniel's body of work not only shows range, but his willingness to explore his versatility in horror, drama, comedy, and suspense genres. "You should approach each and every opportunity with a positive mindset as a chance to grow."
